text.*:
Kuroko's Basketball discography
EPs 1
Singles 27
Soundtrack albums 1

A number of musical CDs have been created for the media franchise built around Tadatoshi Fujimaki's manga Kuroko's Basketball. Various theme songs and character songs were released on a total of 27 singles. One extended play and one soundtrack have also been released.

The anime television series currently consists of four pieces of theme music; two opening themes and two ending themes.

Contents

  • 1 EPs
  • 2 Singles
  • 3 Soundtrack
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links
